body.directions: Listen to the audio, and then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can most reasonably be completed with the word in the audio?
body.answer: 我姐姐在____画画。Wǒ jiějie zài _______huàhuà.
options: 她妈妈在____做饭。Tā māma zài____zuòfàn.
body.correct: You got it! 公园 gōngyuán means “park.” Of the activities in the choices, painting can be most reasonably done at a park. Therefore, this word can best complete the sentence 我姐姐在公园画画。Wǒ jiějie zài gōngyuán huàhuà. (My older sister is painting at the park.)
body.incorrect: Not quite… Think about the meaning of 公园 gōngyuán and what activities can be reasonably done there. Then place it in the sentences in the choices to see which one fits the best for both meaning and structure.

body.quiz: Which of the following activities can most likely be held at the site indicated by the word in the audio?
body.correct: You got it! 体育场 tǐyùchǎng means “stadium.” Of the activities in the choices, only a college football game requires the size and capacity that a stadium can offer.
body.incorrect: Oops… Listen to the audio again to identify what site it is. Then consider the different activities to see which one matches the size and capacity of the site.

body.quiz: In which season is the site indicated by the word in the audio most likely to be crowded?
body.correct: Beautifully done! The word 游泳池 yóuyǒngchí means “swimming pool.” It’s a nice place to go to when it gets hot in the 夏天 xiàtiān (summer).
body.incorrect: Not quite… Listen to the word in the audio again to identify its meaning. Then consider what type of activity can be done there and is most suitable for which season.

body.quiz: Which of the following has a character that’s the same as one of the characters in the word presented?
body.correct: Job excellently done! 健身房 jiànshēnfáng (gym) has the character 房, which is also the first character in 房子 fángzi (house).
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audio to identify its meaning, and then recall the characters that are in it. Compare them to the characters in the choices and find a match. Careful—don’t be confused by the characters with similar shapes in the choices.
